channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jun 11, 23:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 03/07/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/07/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : The backup and restore service will unreachable during this maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Storage Servers BSD.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][HostedPrivateCloud] - Migrate vScope backend to new architecture
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 17, 08:00 UTC  -  Jun 21, 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 02:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/06/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some call apiv6 & ovhplugins won't be functional during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out a replacement of our vScope backend.
This maintenance will be rolled out in several zones.
First wave will be on Monday 17/06/2024 on BHS1A / GRA2A and WAW1C and will be carried out after zone by zone.


Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 17, 06:00 UTC  -  Jun 21, 16:00 UTC

Jun 13, 14:15 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 21/06/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Cloud Connect operation
item.description:
Jun 14, 20:28 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 10, 13:53 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been extended.
Find below for the new end date:

Start time : 27/05/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 14/06/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Cloud connect will be unavailable during the maintenance and each object(Virtual machine) being migrated will be unavailable for 2 hours during the maintenance.

May 31, 14:45 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been extended.
Find below for the new end date:

Start time : 27/05/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 07/06/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Cloud connect will be unavailable during the maintenance and each object(Virtual machine) being migrated will be unavailable for 2 hours during the maintenance.

May 27, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 21, 22:09 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

Start time : 27/05/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/05/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Cloud connect will be unavailable during the maintenance and each object(Virtual machine) being migrated will be unavailable for 2 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating our Veeam Cloud Connect product in Canada and Europe.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS/ERI/LIM/SBG/WAW/RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Licensing
item.description:
Jun 6, 16:11 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 24, 13:45 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 24, 13:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, new license will be provided soon

Start time : 03/06/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/06/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : We are in the process of renewing the Veeam licensing, , but due to some issues, we entered into a Grace Period.
You may experience some issues to get new licenses from our Veeam Enterprise offer and messages speaking about Grace Period.
This isn't impacting our Managed Veeam Backup offer.
Service improvement : We are working the renewal with our partner, we expect to receive the new license in the following days.

Thank you for your understanding.
